activities: In the course of Xactly Corporation's on-demand services, customers are allowed to upload data into Xactly Corporation's servers.  In this context Xactly Corporation acts as the processor and does not control the customer's data.  Xactly does not choose or determine the type of data uploaded into the servers and any access to, or use of, such data is incidental to completing Xactly Corporations contractual obligations to its customer as a processor.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: limited organization, customer, employee with on-line only processing
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for HR Data only; TRUSTe for all other data.
